alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 10:17AM MDT until further notice by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River near Harlem affecting Blaine County. Lodge Creek near International Border affecting Blaine and Hill Counties. For the Milk River...including Harlem...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Lodge Creek...including International Border...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River near Harlem. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 22.2 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage this weekend. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM MDT.
